law.catch_line: Purpose of group of sections within chapter.
law.text: The purpose of this section, KRS 249.010, 249.020, 249.030, 249.040, 249.050, 249.060, 249.070, 249.090, 249.100, 249.101, 249.102, 249.103, 249.104, and 249.105 is to prevent the introduction and dissemination within this Commonwealth of insect pests, plant diseases, and weeds and to provide for their repression and control.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996.
